name: WEN 12-Inch Benchtop Drill Press, Variable Speed, Cast Iron with Laser and Work Light (4214T)
short_description: Features a 5-amp induction motor, a 12-inch swing, and a 3-1/8-inch spindle travel
Adjust the mechanical variable speed anywhere from 580 to 3200 RPM
Digital speed readout displays current RPM of the machine for maximum precision

Includes a Class IIIA 2.5mW laser, overhead light, adjustable depth stop, table roller extension, beveling 9-1/2 by 9-1/2-inch work table, 5/8-inch capacity keyed chuck, a chuck key with onboard storage, and a two-year warranty
Measures in at 16.8 by 13.5 by 36.6 inches in size with a weight of 85 pounds
product_description: Remember when power tools were actually powerful? WEN’s 12-inch swing, variable speed drill press with laser centering device, is a powerhouse for your shop. Packed with features that you’ll find in larger more industrial type drill presses. This bench-top, cast iron drill press has the power to drill through metal, wood and other materials. Max drill capacity is 5/8” in 1” thick cast iron. The variable speed feature allows you to target in the exact speed (infinitely from 580-3200 RPM) that works for your project. While you are working you simply move a lever and adjust the speed as needed. No pulleys and belts to change! Our design uses a mechanical variable speed which allows for the same power and torque through the entire speed range. A digital readout powered by LED’s displays the running speed. Constructed with a rigid frame consisting of cast iron: head, table, and base, ensures accurate holes. Its powerful induction motor features ball bearings for an extended life and it all comes together with smooth and balanced performance even at high speeds. The 5/8” chuck with MT2 spindle taper gives you versatility with a variety of bits and features on-board chuck key storage, so you never have to hunt around for it. Worktable bevels 45° left and right for those tricky operations for the perfect right angles consistently. Base has predrilled holes for mounting onto a bench or work stand. Slotted table allows for mounting clamps and vises for effective mounting. The X-pattern laser locks-on to your drill points saving on guesswork and sparing expensive materials. A versatile and valuable tool for any shop especially when you expand its range of use with optional accessories such as mortising attachments, drum sanders, circle cutters, etc. Since 1951, WEN has proudly produced innovative powered tools focused on value delivering meaningful features that will help you complete and enjoy the work as much as the project. Remember when you could drill with laser-precision? Remember WEN.

product_description: Remember when power tools were actually powerful? The WEN 10-Inch Variable Speed Drill Press powers through metal, wood, plastic and more, with the ability to drill up to a 1/2-inch hole through heavy-duty, 1-inch-thick cast iron. The mechanical variable speed allows you to dial in the exact RPM (from 530 to 3100) for your project with the simple turn of a lever while the digital LED readout displays the current speed. The powerful induction motor features ball bearings for an extended life and balanced performance. The 1/2-inch chuck with JT33 spindle taper gives you versatility with a variety of bits, with on-board chuck key storage for easy organization. The 8 by 7.5-inch cast-iron worktable bevels 45° left and right for those tricky operations. The X-pattern laser shows your drill’s center points, saving on guesswork and sparing expensive materials. The 8 by 12.5-inch cast iron base features predrilled holes for easy mounting to the benchtop or work surface of your choice. And because it’s a WEN product, your drill press comes backed by a two-year warranty, a friendly customer support line, and a stocked inventory of replacement parts. Remember when you could drill with laser precision? Remember WEN.

name: WEN 4208T 2.3-Amp 8-Inch 5-Speed Cast Iron Benchtop Drill Press,Black/Orange
short_description: Features a 2.3A induction motor, an 8-inch swing, and a 2-inch spindle travel
Includes a 1/2-inch keyed chuck and onboard key storage
Operates at 5 different speeds: 740, 1100, 1530, 2100, or 3140 RPM
6.5 by 6.5 inch height adjustable worktable bevels up to 45 degrees in each direction
Measures in at 23 inches tall with a 7 by 11-inch base
product_description: Remember when you could drill with maximum accuracy? Power through metal, wood, plastics, and more with the WEN 8-Inch 5-Speed Drill Press. Don’t let our compact design fool you. Between the five operating speeds, the two-inch spindle travel, and the sturdy construction, you’ll have way more precision than a standard handheld drill. Our 2.3-amp induction motor features ball bearings for smooth balanced performance even at high speed. Manually set your speed to either 740, 1100, 1530, 2100, or 3140 RPM by adjusting the belt position on the two spindles. The easy-to-read, locking depth stop allows for accurate and repeatable drilling operations. The keyed chuck with JT33 spindle taper accepts bits ranging from 1/20 to 1/2 inch in diameter (1.5 to 13 mm). The table bevels 45° left and right for angled drilling. The base is designed with holes for mounting onto a bench or work stand. Clamps and vises are easily mounted to the slotted table, making work-holding safe and effective. And because its a WEN product. a stocked inventory of replacement parts, and a helpful customer phone line. Remember when you could drill holes in almost anything? Remember WEN.

name: Mini Benchtop Drill Press with 16 Pcs All-Material Drill Bit Kit, 1200W 6-Speed 2800RPM, 360° Omnidirectional Rotation, Rotary Tool Workstation Stand, 3.15 Inch Drilling Depth
short_description: 【16 Pcs All-Material Drill Bit Kit + 1200W High-Torque Motor】This kit comes with 16 bits for every job – metal (2/3/4/5/6/8mm), concrete (4/5/6/8/10mm), and wood (4/5/6/8/10mm) – no extra hardware store runs needed. Pair that with the 1200W/2800RPM motor, and you can power through metal brackets, wooden shelves, concrete anchors, or plastic parts easy. Perfect for garage workshops and heavy-duty at-home repairs.

【Instantly Switch from Drilling to Grinding】Rotate the drill head 90° in seconds (grinding wheel sold separately). No more swapping tools – seamlessly handle metal deburring, sharpening, or precision drilling in one compact workstation. Maximize workspace efficiency with dual functionality.

【Pro-Grade Versatility for Workshops】Chuck grips bits from 1.5-13mm (1/16"–1/2") – perfect for custom furniture, RC models, appliance repairs, and workshop fabrication. Your all-in-one solution for serious DIY.

【Triple-Handle Control for Rock-Solid Precision】Three extended cranks eliminate wobble and reduce hand fatigue. Fine-tune depth and pressure effortlessly during delicate or heavy-duty work. Master thick steel or delicate electronics with smooth, controlled pressure.
【Adjust Drilling Height in Seconds】Slide the power head up/down freely, then lock with one screw. Adapt seamlessly to varying workpiece sizes while maintaining project continuity.

name: 15 inch Benchtop Drill Press, 7.5A Copper Motor Drill Press Machine, Variable Speed 288-3084 RPM, Tilting Table for Wood and Metal Working
short_description: Powerful & Efficient Copper Motor Equipped with a 7.5AMP 120V pure copper motor, this bench top drill press delivers exceptional power and superior performance with better heat resistance and longevity compared to aluminum motors. Effortlessly drill through hardwoods, metals, and plastics.

Precise & Variable Speed Control Achieve the perfect cut every time with variable speed control (288-3084 RPM). Easily adjust the speed to match different materials and drill bit sizes, ensuring clean, precise holes in wood, metal, and acrylic for all your DIY projects.

15" Swing & Flexible Tilting Table The 15-inch swing capacity provides ample workspace for handling larger pieces. The worktable can be tilted from 0 to 45 degrees to the left and right, facilitating angled drilling operations with great precision and flexibility.

Robust Construction & User-Friendly Design Built with a heavy-duty cast iron base and column for maximum stability and reduced vibration during operation. The open design (without a built-in safety guard) offers unobstructed visibility and easier access, ideal for experienced DIYers and craftsmen.

Complete Package & Thoughtful Details： Comes with a 5/8” keyed chuck and includes necessary wrenches for easy setup and operation. The clear depth scale and depth stop allow for consistent and repeatable drilling depth, enhancing your workshop efficiency.
